title: S7E04 – "Never Mind the Mayhem" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Kyle Harrison, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about imaginary evils, ghastly get-aways, robberies gone wrong, and dangers Down Under. 

Today's episode is proudly brought to you by NordVPN. Right now, our listeners can get 70% off NordVPN! That’s only $3.49/mo, plus you get an additional month FREE at https://nordvpn.com/scarystories Or use coupon code: SCARYSTORIES
